channel.title: Static Function Namespace on ScrapComputers
channel.description: Recent content in Static Function Namespace on ScrapComputers

item.title: sm.interactable.connectionType
item.description: - ScrapComputers adds 2 new connection types when loaded. They are used for such as connecting components to components! Fields sm.

item.title: sm.scrapcomputers
item.description: All data inside the sm.scrapcomputers namespace! Fields privateDataPrefix [ string ] The prefix used for components for interfacing together without being public to the computer API.

item.title: sm.scrapcomputers.config
item.description: This one allows you to add configurations and look at the values for it. You can modify them at the Configurator, An interactable that allows you to modify the configs of the mod and add-ons.
